channel.title: Login Problem
channel.description:
-Problem Solved
[s]On my server, after you logout it takes forever to log back in, you have to press the login button forever until you get lucky. Is this because the run.bat is busy with all the other players saving and such or something else? No, its not because of my playerlimit, checked it in playerhandler.java and the int says 200.
Thanks, Play For Keeps [/s]

item.title: Login Problem
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“Hidendra, post:5, topic:218570”][quote author=boomer4456 link=topic=287208.msg2325912#msg2325912 date=1215685272]
omfg!!! hwo doy uo get ppl on yur serve ri powrtfowarded and evertything!!! :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad:
[/quote]
http://www.google.com/search?q=Define:%20idiot
lol

ontopic: It may be the server itself, how it handles logouts, where it didn’t do something and when they try to login again the user may still be there? not 100% sure on that though, since all bases are different these days. :/[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Login Problem
item.dc:creator: @Play_For_Keeps Play For Keeps
item.description:
@Play_For_Keeps wrote:

ok, thanks, and boomer, wtf? I’m not asking how I get people on my server, I’m saying that I was having a problem with the length of time it takes to get on. Read before you spam/flame.

Read full topic

Beat you Hidendra its because the login handler isnt accepting the parseincoming packets.
